sentences.en: Uniformly, these people experienced weightlessness and the sensation that their bodies were being stretched lengthwise.
sentences.cn: 无一例外地，这些人都体验到了失重和身体被纵向拉伸的感觉。

sentences.en: Also a cut lengthwise on the nose.
sentences.cn: 还有鼻子上长长的纵向伤痕。

sentences.en: Cut the orange in half lengthwise.
